Test Name: Phenytoin, Total and Phenobarbital Group, Serum
Purpose: To accurately measure total phenytoin and phenobarbital concentrations in patient serum for therapeutic drug monitoring and clinical management.
Container: Plain red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Roche COBAS) with phenytoin and phenobarbital reagent kits
